lines.text:
[on Bonnie's interrupted honeymoon]
And all was lost save honor.

[to Lt. Langley, who like her is heir to a business fortune]
I'm cans, you're beef. Together we're canned beef.
I am an alcoholic artist, I mean, an artist with alcohol!

[to Michele, after dinner in his hotel suite]
Shall we adjourn to the scene of operations?

[he has brought her a rose]
It's one of those artificial ones.
I didn't know it was artificial when I stole it from the hotel lobby.
